youtube.title: How a Kidney Transplant Is Done: Step-by-Step Animation
youtube.description: Discover the complex process of a kidney transplant in this detailed medical animation. We cover the surgical steps, including vascular connections and ureter placement. Learn how biology and modern medicine work together to give patients a second chance at life.
